QuestData.Title: The Dark Heart of Oshu'gun
QuestData.Description: We are not far from the inner chamber, $n. The truth behind the evil here awaits us.$b$bI can project my spirit into the chamber to guide you, but it will be up to you to defeat the evil that lays within.$b$bMay the wind of Kalandrios guide your arm, the wisdom of Aborius enlighten your faculties, and the flame of Incineratus burn your enemies.$b$bMay the memory of Gordawg be your shield.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the Sanctum of the Naaru.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $n.$b$bBy defeating the void god Decimatus, the destruction of this great valley has been avoided. The threat of the pale has subsided for now as well.$b$bThe loss of Gordawg will be felt throughout Nagrand, but someday a new earthen fury will take seat upon the Throne of Elements and balance will be restored.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the Sanctum of the Naaru
